DOC.brief_summary: This study design compliance ICH-E14 guideline ( 2005 ) evaluate effect ANX-188 therapeutic supratherapeutic concentration cardiac repolarization , specifically , Fridericia 's QT-Interval ( QTcF )
DOC.brief_title: ANX-188 Thorough QT/QTc Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 65 ( inclusive ) good health determine past medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , laboratory test screen . Participation clinical trial within last 60 day Pregnant lactate female Use prescription drug , herbal , overthecounter medication within 14 day prior study day 2 Uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia , cardiac valve abnormality , normal sinus rhythm Smokers tobacco product user prior 3 month Presence clinically significant illness Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
